exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Do push-ups with your hands on the ground

exercises.name: Sit-ups
exercises.description: Lie down and sit up, touching your toes

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and squat down

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Step forward with one leg and bend the knee until the thigh is parallel to the ground

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold your body in a straight line from head to toe, supported by your forearms and toes
